topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Lugar legal. Jantar no andar de cima √© tranquilo com vista para o mar. O jantar no andar de baixo √© alto e selvagem. M√∫sica ao vivo. We had a great attentive waitress.  My fiance ordered a long island iced tea.  It was very heavy on the alcohol, but very worth the price.

topComments.author: Banjo‚Äôs World

A comida era √≥tima e os pre√ßos eram muito razo√°veis. Ap√≥s a nossa refei√ß√£o, descemos para o deck inferior para tomar uma bebida antes de irmos para a praia. (Original) I haven‚Äôt been to the Ocean Deck in so long! We  stopped by after a day trip to Daytona today and it was just as it was years ago‚Ä¶ truly iconic! The parking is awful but so is any spot in Daytona, so that‚Äôs the only complaint. Our party of six was warmly welcomed and served promptly. The food was great and the prices were very reasonable. After our meal, we went downstairs to the lower deck to have a drink before we hit the beach. They had no problems with us coming and going to the restrooms which was nice because the restrooms are kept very clean. If you‚Äôre ever in town, don‚Äôt miss this beach front oasis!

(Original) It‚Äôs a popular restaurant similar to any other beach side restaurants. It opened a small portion of entire restaurant and the deck was closed. We went there for a lunch. The waitress prompted us to order a lot more than we needed and add more toppings so that we had bunch of leftovers to take back. We even couldn‚Äôt finish all leftovers as a dinner later in the evening. I don‚Äôt think it‚Äôs a good way to have more business or tips. The portion of appetizers is big, almost like a meal. topComments.author: Colin Bosler
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este √© um √≥timo lugar para um jantar casual que oferece acesso direto √† praia de Daytona! A comida √© preparada na hora e bastante saborosa. Os funcion√°rios s√£o simp√°ticos e n√≥s gostamos de estar do lado de fora com vista para o mar e a brisa enquanto com√≠amos. Eu n√£o poderia ir 5 estrelas embora como a √°rea para fumantes √© o mesmo que a √°rea de alimenta√ß√£o externa, o que √© muito inc√¥modo para aqueles que n√£o fumam. Tamb√©m fica muito ocupado e muito barulhento, ent√£o ouvir uma conversa pode ser dif√≠cil. Dica profissional - o estacionamento √© um verdadeiro desafio, mas eles t√™m estacionamento com manobrista se voc√™ optar por us√°-lo.  (Original) This is a great place for casual dining that offers direct access to Daytona beach! The food is freshly prepared and quite tasty. The staff are friendly and we enjoyed sitting outside with the view of the ocean and the breeze while we ate. I couldn't go 5 stars though as the smoking area is the same as the outside eating area so that's very bothersome to those that don't smoke. It also gets very busy and very loud, so hearing a conversation can be difficult. Pro-tip - parking is a real challenge but they do have valet parking if you choose to use it.

topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) O ambiente √© incr√≠vel e o atendimento √© bom. A comida √© boa, eu s√≥ esperava melhor de um lugar na praia. Em um prato, tivemos o camar√£o mariscos. Foi o mesmo que voc√™ recebe no Capt Ds. O salm√£o estava bom e o molho de peixe tamb√©m.  (Original) The atmosphere is amazing and the service is good. The food is good, I just expected better from a place on the beach. On one dish we had the clams shrimp. It was the same that you get at Capt Ds. The salmon was good and so was the fish dip.

topComments.author: yogirlci
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Este lugar tinha excelente comida fresca, incluindo os legumes! Todos os itens como Caranguejo e Lagosta s√£o pre√ßos de mercado. Minhas garras de caranguejo eram menores do que o normal e um pouco mais cozidas; no entanto, eu ainda gostei muito. Eu decidi comer no bar do andar de baixo, que √© t√£o grande quanto o restaurante. A mesa estava um pouco pegajosa, mas tudo parecia limpo, incluindo os banheiros. As bebidas eram boas, bem, eu recomendaria as fotos de torta de lim√£o! Tamb√©m h√° uma m√°quina de karaok√™ como waffle house se voc√™ quiser que uma m√∫sica selecionada venha no r√°dio. O gar√ßom foi atencioso!  (Original) This place had great fresh food including the veggies! All items like Crab and Lobster are market price. My crab claws were smaller than normal and a lil over cooked; however, I still really enjoyed it. I decided to eat at the downstairs bar which is as big as the restaurant. The table was a little sticky but everything looked clean including the bathrooms. The drinks were good as well I would recommend the key lime pie shots! Also there is a karaoke machine like waffle house if you want a select song to come on the radio. The waiter was attentive!
